Parameter.Name: Port
Parameter.Description: Many programming blocks require that you select the ports on the EV3 Brick (A, B, C, D, 1, 2, 3, and 4) that these blocks will use. The Port Selectors are in the top right-hand corner of these blocks.

Parameter.Name: GyroX
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Angular velocity along the X-axis

Parameter.Name: GyroY
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Angular velocity along the Y-axis

Parameter.Name: GyroZ
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Angular velocity along the Z-axis

Block.Description: The Measure - Acceleration mode measures and outputs the accelerations along the X, Y, and Z axes.
The Measure - Acceleration mode measures and outputs the temperature.
The Measure - Acceleration mode measures and outputs the angular velocities along the X, Y, and Z axes.
